GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v6.0.6
GSD.description:
nvme-hwmon: kmalloc the NVME SMART log buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.6 by commit 704d5f5d119588d18d125573cfdbef04e1f44f07, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 400b6a7b13a3fd71cff087139ce45dd1e5fff444. For more details please see the references link.
